description:
The Traverse Fitted Half-Zip Long Sleeve Top offers the ideal solution for outdoor adventures of all kinds. It showcases a convenient half-zip design for personalized ventilation, a form-fitting silhouette that complements your physique, and a protective stand collar for your neck.

  • This top is crafted from a combination of recycled polyester and spandex, ensuring durability and flexibility to handle diverse weather conditions
  • It boasts four-way stretch, moisture-wicking, and odor-resistant properties, making it the perfect choice for activities like running, skiing, or hiking
  • Whether you require a dependable base layer or a stand-alone top, the women's Traverse Fitted Half-Zip Long Sleeve Top provides versatility and fashion for any occasion
name: MPG Traverse Fitted 1/2 Zip Long Sleeve - Women's
